class.name: AnimationNodeStateMachinePlayback

method.name: get_current_node
method.description: Returns the currently playing animation state.

method.name: get_current_play_position
method.description: Returns the playback position within the current animation state.

method.name: get_travel_path
method.description: Returns the current travel path as computed internally by the A* algorithm.

method.name: is_playing
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if an animation is playing.

method.name: travel
method.description: Transitions from the current state to another one, following the shortest path.

signal.name: state_changed
signal.description: Notified when a state transition occurs. Emitted before [signal state_enter]. Not emitted for the first state.

signal.name: state_enter
signal.description: Notifies when a state is entered.

signal.name: state_exit
signal.description: Notifies when a state is exited.
